election_record.label: Connecticut 1820 Governor

overview.note: Benjamin Tilmage and Gideon Woodruff are listed in the Original Election Returns as candidates but there are no votes listed for them.

sub_unit.name: Stratford
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: East Hartford
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Saybrook
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Saybrook.

sub_unit.name: Guilford
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 3 votes as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Hebron
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 6 votes as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Woodstock
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. State Archives, Connecticut State Library, Hartford.
The Connecticut Journal (New Haven, CT). April 25, 1820.
The Times, and Weekly Advertiser (Hartford, CT). April 25, 1820.
Connecticut Herald, and General Advertiser (New Haven, CT). May 2, 1820.
